        public static boolean setActiveState(java.lang.String id)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • destroyState

        public static boolean destroyState(int id)
        destroys the state at the given id (to free up RAM)
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the state to remove
        Returns:
        true if a state was removed - false if there was no state at that id

      • destroyTempStates

        public static void destroyTempStates()
        destroys all temporary states (anything below START_TEMP_ID). DOES NOT destroy the active state een if it's a temp state

      • getTempID

        public static java.lang.Integer getTempID()
        get a temp ID for a temp state to use. garunteed to be unique in the library

      • getID

        Parameters:
        id - the id you're looking for in string form
        Returns:
        the int mapping. returns -1 if the string id does not exist.
